** counters
.
\newcounter{c}
\stepcounter{c}
\thec: \roman{c}

\addtocounter{c}{3 * -(2+1)}    % 1 - 9
\arabic{c}

\setcounter{c}{ 3*\real{1.6} * \real{1.7 } + -- 2 }
\thec: \Roman{c}

\the\value{c}

\newcounter{a}[c]
\setcounter{a}{\value{c}}

\stepcounter{c}
\arabic{a}          % should be reset now due to stepcounter
\fnsymbol{c}
.
<div class="body">
<p>1: i</p>
<p>-8</p>
<p>8: VIII</p>
<p>8</p>
<p>0 ‡‡</p>
</div>
.


** clear inner counters
.
\newcounter{c}
\stepcounter{c}

\newcounter{a}[c]	% c -> a,b -> d
\newcounter{b}[c]
\newcounter{d}[b]

\setcounter{a}{5}
\setcounter{b}{6}
\setcounter{d}{3}

\arabic{a}
\arabic{b}
\arabic{c}
\arabic{d}

\stepcounter{a}
\arabic{a}
\arabic{b}
\arabic{c}
\arabic{d}

\stepcounter{c}
\arabic{a}          % should be reset now due to stepcounter
\arabic{b}          % should be reset now due to stepcounter
\arabic{c}
\arabic{d}

\stepcounter{b}
\arabic{a}
\arabic{b}
\arabic{c}
\arabic{d}
.
<div class="body">
<p>5 6 1 3</p>
<p>6 6 1 3</p>
<p>0 0 2 0</p>
<p>0 1 2 0</p>
</div>
.
